text: Maurice Bedel in 1927 Maurice Bedel (Paris, December 30, 1883 – Thuré (Vienne), October 15, 1954) was a French novelist and essayist. He was awarded with the prix Goncourt in 1927 for Jérôme 60° latitude nord.
